sentences.sContent: a historic meeting of world leaders
sentences.sCn: 具有历史意义的世界领导人会议

sentences.sContent: ‘It is a historic moment ,’ he told journalists.
sentences.sCn: “那是历史性的一刻。”他告诉新闻记者。

sentences.sContent: ...More than a quarter of children live in singleparent households — a historic high...
...This nameless person pushed the human race over a historic threshold...
...one we ought to take steps to preserve as we would a historic building or a significant work of art...

trans.tranOther: a historic event or act is very important and will be recorded as part of history
